io.netty.buffer

Class AbstractMessageBuf<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractQueue<T>
        • io.netty.buffer.AbstractMessageBuf<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Buf, MessageBuf<T>, ReferenceCounted, Iterable<T>, Collection<T>, Queue<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultMessageBuf

    public abstract class AbstractMessageBuf<T>
extends AbstractQueue<T>
implements MessageBuf<T>
    Abstract base class for MessageBuf implementations.
